item.title: Venice Theatre gets new challenge gift to restore mainstage space
item.description: As it moves closer to reaching a $25 million goal to rebuild its mainstage theater that washeavily damaged during Hurricane Ian in 2022, Venice Theatre is getting some significant financial boosts.

item.title: Make 38 pounds of nugget ice per day with this GE nugget ice maker
item.description: Do you have a nugget ice obsession? I will admit that Chick-Fil-A's ice istop tier. Now, you can enjoy your favorite ice at home with thisGE Profile Opal Countertop Nugget Ice Maker. The best part? It's 39% off at Amazon during the retailer'sPrime Day shopping event. It's also available in this gorgeous 'Moonstone Blue' to keep it from being an eyesore on your counters.

item.title: Democrats sue over access to 'Alligator Alcatraz'‚Ä¶
item.description: A group of Democratic state lawmakers who were denied entry to a controversial immigrant-detention center in the Everglades asked the Florida Supreme Court on Thursday to force Gov. Ron DeSantis ‚Äúto provide immediate, unannounced access‚Äù to the remote facility, dubbed ‚ÄúAlligator Alcatraz‚Äù by state Republican leaders.
